title: Pinkfong & Baby Shark Christmas Stage Show
blurb: Sing, dance, and celebrate the festive season.
description: Embark on a Christmas Adventure together with Pinkfong and Baby Shark. Sing, dance, and celebrate the festive season together. Spend $50 nett to redeem a photo pass. The LIVE Stage Show runs for the first 30 minutes, followed by a 30-minute Meet & Greet session. Limited to 1 redemption per member, per day. Limited to the first 50 redemptions per session. Photo pass is valid for same-day redemption only. Each photo pass is limited to a maximum of 5 pax per group including infant in hand. No advance booking is allowed. Only the Photo Pass holder may enter the enclosed Meet & Greet area. Meet & Greet passes are non-exchangeable for other sessions or timeslots. Redemption is available only within 1 hour before the showtime and must be done in person.

title: Christmas Activities at Woodleigh Mall
blurb: Redeem a play pass with a minimum spend.
description: Spend $50 nett to redeem a play pass. Kids Squad members receive an additional pass. “Christmas Activities” (Play area) is open to all children between the ages of 18 months to 12 years old. Play slots are available on a first-come, first served and on a while stocks last basis. Each qualifying pass admits 1 child and 1 adult only. No food and drinks are allowed in the play area. No pushing or rough play are allowed in the play area. Children under the age of 7 years old should always be accompanied by an adult. Any valuables brought inside to the play area will be at the owner’s discretion. The Organisers shall not be liable for any loss of property. All participants must ensure their own safety, and of others inside the play area.
datetime_display: Mon - Thu: 3pm to 9.30pm | Fri - Sun: 2pm to 9.30pm

title: Frosty Snow Play at Woodleigh Mall
blurb: Enjoy snow play at the L1 Entrance.
description: Enjoy Frosty Snow Play at L1 Entrance near Collin’s® Gastro Dining. Subject to weather conditions.
